Safe, professional ear care in the comfort of your own home

If you’re in Lichfield and struggling with blocked ears, our professional ear wax removal service offers quick relief without leaving home. Earwego provides safe, convenient ear care delivered by trained clinicians right across Lichfield and the wider Lichfield area. We visit areas including Baswich, Weeping Cross, Wildwood and nearby villages such as Brocton and Great Haywood. Using advanced microsuction, we gently remove ear wax to restore clear, comfortable hearing.

What to Expect

Here’s what happens during your at-home ear wax removal appointment:

1

Book online or by phone

Easily schedule your appointment online or over the phone at a time that suits you.

2

We visit at a time that suits you

Your clinician arrives at your home with safe, sterilised equipment ready for treatment.

3

The clinician checks your ears and explains the process

A short assessment ensures your ears are ready, and the clinician explains each step clearly.

4

Microsuction gently removes wax

Gentle medical suction removes ear wax quickly and safely — no water or mess involved.

5

Aftercare advice provided

We provide simple aftercare tips to help you maintain clear, healthy ears after treatment.

Appointments typically last around 30 minutes, and most clients notice immediate relief and clearer hearing.
